title: Jinyoung Park (mathematician)
summary: Jinyoung Park (Korean: 박진영; born 1982) is a South Korean mathematician at Stanford University working in combinatorics and graph theory. In 2022, she released a preprint containing a 6-page proposed proof of the Kahn–Kalai conjecture with Huy Tuan Pham.[1][2][3][4]
